Articles.Content:
First I am quite sad about it.

Second, as all the required files are there in the squad files, how do I mess with the .cfg files to make it reappear?

Change the category from none to Pods.

From 

	entryCost = 0
	cost = 3800
	category = none
	subcategory = 0
	title = #autoLOC_500304 //#autoLOC_500304 = Mk1-2 Command Pod

to 

	entryCost = 0
	cost = 3800
	category = Pods
	subcategory = 0
	title = #autoLOC_500304 //#autoLOC_500304 = Mk1-2 Command Pod

 

On another note, what do you not like about the Mk 1-3 pod? Just asking.
Just select "Advanced mode" in the editor, and use any sorting function. It's still right there.
Nah, i just have a mod that uses this pod.

If it's the SDHI SMS, you'll be happy to know that @sumghai is working on a new version that is designed to mate with the 1-3, but you can still use the 1-3 with the current version, if you don't mind the BPC hatch and umbilical not lining up.

Hmm, if that mod is compatible with v 1.4.4, i may consider downloading it.

Anyway, mine is aset IVA.
